name: unfinished-business
description: Move yesterdays unfinished tasks to today

scripts.preview: gh-social-preview.py -t "Unfinished Business" -e "Productivity, GTD. But nottoday, maybe tomorrow. If not, then the day after." -i "background.png" -f "BebasNeue-Regular.ttf" -b "Montserrat-VariableFont_wght.ttf" -l icon.png -v "$npm_package_version"

author: Alex Qwxlea
